reviews.comments: Excelente departamento! Totalmente recomendable.

Gustavo nuevamente ha sido un anfitrión increíble. No hace falta nunca nada! Siempre hay más!
El departamento está perfectamente ubicado y es un placer su limpieza y decoración. 
Recomendable 100%
Increible lugar, ubicación, accesibilidad, atención y limpieza, totalmente recomendable!
Hermoso departamento en Palermo Hollywood, muy segura la zona. Gustavo super amable y atento a todos los mensajes que le envié. Quedé maravillada, me encantó...volveré!!!
Todo perfecto! Muy bueno el departamento, con todas las comodidades. Gus un genio.

Excelente estancia en el nuevo depto de Gustavo para dos personas. Es la cuarta vez que nos alojamos en sus deptos. y siempre es muy destacable su dedicación para recibirnos y resolver todas nuestras dudas.
Muy recomendable!!!
Excelente anfitrión! Más recomendable como servicial, atento y buen tipo que ninguna otra cosa! Súper recomendable! Abrazo y bendiciones Gus!
El departamento es muy funcional limpio y muy buen ubicado, los guardias del departamento muy serviciales y con excelente trato. Nos sentimos muy cómodos y pudimos disfrutar los días allí.
Muy lindo dpto, muy completo, seguridad 24hs, excelente ubicación en Palermo, muy buena atención de Gustavo, el anfitrion
El dtpo es muy limpio y luminoso,tal cual se ve en las fotos,Gustavo un muy buen anfitrion,sin dudas volveria!
Todo perfecto. Gustavo muy dispuesto a las consultas.Super recomendable. Regresare.

100 % recomendable. Gustavo atento. El departamento muy bien equipado!
Volvería a ir sin dudas.
Excelente departamento! Todo muy limpio, seguro y confortable. Gustavo siempre estuvo atento a nuestras solicitudes, respondiendo rápidamente. La zona es hermosa. 100% recomendable!!

Un lugar precioso, moderno, limpio y con mucha seguridad . Con cercanía al Subte y a centros comerciales.
El anfitrión siempre atento a todo lo que solicitamos. 
Muy recomendable!
Lugar muy moderno, bien equipado, con mucho cuidado por los detalles.

Un lugar muy confortable, con gran seguridad. El departamento es muy luminoso y moderno.
La comunicación con Gustavo fue fluida, amena y siempre estuvo a la orden.
Excelente ubicación con cercanía al subte y a paradas de buses. 
Muy recomendable!
Muy recomendable el apartamento. Muy bien situado, todo tipo de detalles y Gustavo muy atento.
Gus es un anfitrion genial. Todo muy bien. Gracias!!!!!

Lindo dpto 
Linda zona
Gustavo was a great, responsive host. We loved the apartment, its amenities and the location. We couldn't have asked for a better experience for our trip to BA.

PERFECT. The room was very nice and well equipped. Had everything we needed and more. The bathroom was spacious and nice. We loved the neighborhood & it was right by tons of great restaurants. Highly recommend!
Nice studio, really nice neighbourhood, recommend the place for friends or couples, we had a lovely time!

Gustavo’s apartment is in a great location, place is clean and very nice, just like in the pictures. Aircon works well. Gus communicates very well and you get an answer to your questions almost immediately! Would definitely recommend the place :)
reviews.response: Thank you guys! Was a pleasure having you as guests! Glad you enjoyed it! Gus

reviews.comments: Really relaxt place and good location in very safe barrio
reviews.response: Avoid this guest. Simple. Avoid her.

reviews.comments: Gustavo's apartment in the Palermo neighborhood of Buenos Aires was perfect for us. It is in a great location that has plenty to do within walking distance including countless restaurants, markets, and the famous gardens, as well as public transportation. The whole city of Buenos Aires was so green and walkable. Gus was available at all times and answered all of our questions right away. He even set up a taxi to pick us up and take us to the airport for our arrival and departure. We would definitely stay with Gus again.
Really good place to stay in Palermo Hollywood. The appartement is what it looks likes on the pictures. Gus is a good host!!!
We had an amazing time in BA. The appartment is located in a perfect area. Nice and clean appartment and a lovely Pool on the rooftop. Couldnt imagine anything better for our stay.
A great place and location. Easy communication - thanks again Gus!
Gus is a professional! Answering in seconds, good Tips and a nice apartment in the middle of Palermo. Thumbs up!
Great place (great bed!), great location, great host. Recommended!
Fantastic host! Beautiful apartment, great location,  and Gustavo is super nice and helpful.
Super Lage in einem der Szeneviertel von BA, dennoch ruhig, super platz zum chillen am und im Dachpool .absolut sicher. Cooler Vermieter.

Was a wonderful stay at Gustavo’s! The apartment is located straight in the hotspot of Buenos Aires with a supermarket, and everything you need in walking distance. The interior was amazing and garnished with the incredible rooftop with pool, sauna and whirlpool. Gus is very friendly and communication is very easy. Looking forward to staying again at Gus’s place.

Gustavo’s place was fantastic. Just as described and spotlessly clean. Location is perfect in heart of Palermo. We really enjoyed our stay and Gustavo was very helpful and responded to any questions we had within minutes. Would recommend to anyone!!!

There are no words to describe how impeccable everything  is at Gustavo's place. His hospitality, check in experience, great location, brand new building, air conditioning,bed, bathroom, kitchen, security,pool, sauna, bbq.
YOU MUST TRY IT TO EXPERIENCE PERFECTION.

I would stay here again in a heartbeat if I come back to BA. The place is amazing for one or two people. The entire building has a doorman 24/7 which is really nice, the apartment is clean and everything works extremely well, the sauna/pool/deck on the 9th floor make it an A+ apartment. Also, the location is great for the local area to the subway and restaurants. And I can’t say enough about Gus, he is extremely responsive for whatever questions you have and anything you need during your stay!
This is a great apartment, neighborhood is hip and lively, and all in all a great location for visiting BA. We loved it.
Ótimo espaço, com boa localização e anfitrião muito atencioso.
It was a great stay in Palermo. Close to everything. The apartment is small but enough to visit the city. The swimming pool great too!

This place was perfect! Located close to public transport, supermarkets, restaurants and Palermo which was by far our favourite suburb. Gustavo was kind and met us on arrival and gave us some tips and tricks. Definitely recommend!

Palermo is a very nice area to stay in. 

The apartment was lovely and Gus was extremely helpful prior to my arrival, providing transport suggestions from the airport etc. 

He also gave me some great tips on what to see and do in BA during my visit, places to eat,  tours available...

I really enjoyed my time at Gus's apartment and would highly recommended it as a place to stay.
Very nice studio apartment. Super clean, comfortable bed. Located in Palermo Hollywood, one of the best neighborhoods in Buenos Aires. I highly recommend this place!!
Great host! Very clean and lovely decor!

From the start, Gus was expecting us,  gave us a warm welcome and gave us tips.  The place was immaculate and had everything we ever needed in what would become our new home for a few days.  It was very safe and in an excellent location with access to the best Palermo could offer.  Our special thanks to Hugo, the concierge who looked after us and gave us genuine friendship and Argentine warmth. My wife and I have traveled the world and this is the best rating we could give.  
Only tip for the visitors would be a) Ask how to use the cooktop --it uses special pots (provided, but not obvious) , and b) don't hang wet towels under the sink, you'll get rust on them LOL.  Gus was incredibly accommodating letting us stay a little longer and gave us a break on the towels, but he has every right to charge for them. Gus always responds in (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)!
Highly recommended!
Great location and perfect place for 2. Nice, new building and the 24-hr doorman is a nice benefit. Gus is so easy to work with and helpful for great BsAs tips. Would definitely stay here again!

The place is even better (and bigger) than it looks in the pics. There is a very prepared kitchen if you feel like saving money from one meal or so, a lovely balcony to sip some wine before go out to the night, and it's in a great and very walkable neighborhood with lots of bars and restaurants. Gus was super kind giving tips to our time in the city and allowing us to check out a bit later. I would 100% recommend it.

I stayed for two weeks with my husband and my one year old. Comunication was great, the apartment is exactly what is in the pictures, which is great! Felt very secured because of the lovely security gentelman 24 hs at the door. Walking everywhere to have the best restaurants and cafes. He even left a few rubber duckies for my daughter to play with in the tub. Definitely gonna come back here on our yearly trip next year. Absolutely recommend him.

This place was perfect for a couple to stay in. Very clean and great location. 24 hour door man. The host was very helpful with check in and out as well as giving suggestions on sites to see in the city.

We loved our stay in Gus spot! The studio provides everything you may need. It's also close to public transportation and really good restaurants and bars. 
It was really easy to talk with Gus. We was there to check us out and he was really kind. 
I strongly recommend this place and this host.

Had a great stay at Gus's place. Was in a good location close to buses, trains and subway. Walking distance to restaurants was good also. Gus was out of town for our entire but this did not impact the service that he provided. Communication was effective and he was a great help with transfers to and from the airport. Check in/out was very easy as well.
Tudo dentro da medida exata! Recomendo
Clean, safe place to stay!
reviews.response:
I don t use to leave public responses, but in this case I ll do it. Savanah gave me 3 stars despite I welcomed her 3 hours before check in. Also, I was there to check them in (her and a local guy) and since this guy said he was going to her guide, I felt no need to stay and also when they both said they were tired, going to take a nap and the guy said HE WAS DRUNK. So, if you re there, with tired and a drunk person, I felt there was no need to stay longer. Maybe I should stay trying to explain things until they ask me to leave. Sometimes being courteous is not what they expect. 
They were not in touch. It was hard to have responses. I don t know if recommending them.

reviews.comments: Gustavo is an exceptional host. When we arrived, he helped us settle in then pulled out a map of Buenos Aires and pointed out all of the nearby attractions and recommended restaurants. His place is conveniently located by many of the city's famous parks and historical sites - and it's the perfect spot to return to for a glass of wine at the end of the day. Book it now!
Great spot to visit restaurants and the city 10/10
I love it! Best place in Buenos Aires  to stay. Calm and clean!

I love the apartment. It is very modern, comfortable and clean and it has everything that you can possibly need (blow dryer, iron etc). It is very well located, walking distance to a lot of restaurants ,bars and shopping places. Gustavo was very nice and friendly. I will definitely recommend this place.

Gustavo is the perfect Airbnb host! On top of a beautiful, modern, centrally located, clean apartment, Gus also provided taxi reservations, restaurant recommendations (and discounts), and maps of the area along with where to go during your stay. He also lends a Subte card (train/metro card) for you to use and refill without having to buy your own. Did I also mention Netflix, Amazon TV, cable tv, fast WiFi, and a stereo? 

His place has it all, is a great value in the best neighborhood and he is a great host, always staying in contact to make sure you have what you need. 

Thank you Gus! We'll be back!
Nette Lage mitten in Palermo, Balkon sehr angenehm, und Gus war ein engagierter Gastgeber
I usually don't write and reviews, but this time I just couldn't NOT do it. We had the most wonderful time. The appartement is located in the middle of one of the most exclusive and excitig

Gus' studio is in a fantastic location- you go out of the door and you can select from a variety of very good restaurants and cool bars! Fantastic! Also only Short walking distance to metro.
The studio provides you with everything you need, also the entertainment set looked great (haven't used it though, BA entertained us enough ;-) ). 
The communication with Gus was very good and he even helped us with arranging our departure by taxi (BTW: only short distance to Newbery national airport).
Only thing to consider is that if you are a "light" sleeper you might have some trouble. The street is rather quiet but the house itself is a bit loud. Still we recommend the studio warmly!!
Very good location. Gustavo gave us good recommandations

We loved our stay at gustavo's ! The apartment is very comfortable and in an excellent location . The area has lots of restaurants , shops and is very close to a tube station. Gustavo was an excellent and very helpful host, booking things for us and giving us plenty of recommendations. We would definitely recommend this apartment and Gustavo to all our friends ! Thank you Gus!

Gustavo's place was amazing! The flat itself was cool and tranquil, yet just moments away from loads of bars and restaurants in a great neighbourhood. Gustavo was a great host, really welcoming and friendly, and this was refected in the flat: everything you could possibly need for a comfortable stay was there. Gustavo has thought of everything. The roof space is fantastic too, fab for cooling off and chilling out. We spent our last 3 nights of a 3-week holiday in Argentina here, and it was the perfect place to round off our trip in style. Highly recommended!

Excellent studio to stay in, very clean and amazing amenities / view.  Also located in a prime location within walking distance to restaurants, shops, nightlife & the metro.  Gus was also very accommodating and helpful, gave us some good local tips as well as arranged some of our travel/entertainment.  Super friendly and knows what he is doing & talking about!

Gustavo is a great host! Communication with him is permanent and he makes everything very easy for you. The place was perfect for me, it felt like being in a really nice hotel room but adding a very complete kitchen with a full size fridge/freezer. The apartment is full of little details that make a difference in your experience.
The pool in the building is a big plus.
Great place and host !!

Gus was great! From the start the communication was fantastic and he was very prompt in the response. Gus even help me to organise the transfer from the airport to the apartment and back to the airport again. Check in was so easy and the place was amazing! The amenities make you feel like in a 4 or 5 star hotel.

The apartment was close to public transport, restaurants and nightlife. I would definitely stay here again on my next visit. Thanks Gus!
Gustavo was very nice and helpful. He provided recommendations and lend us his subway card which was greatly appreciated. The condo was nice and clean and met all our needs.
